'''1.6.4 Build 16'''<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the sixteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released on April 24, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==

=== '''General''' ===
* Completely new Assignment system where you can set multiple assignments and you can track the student progress. (Client side).
* New User Control panel in server window. You can administrate alias protection and whitelist with it.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* External translations path was wrong in client. Everything works now as described [https://web.archive.org/web/20160505142802/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/index.php?title=Localization here].
